articles.title: Aleksandra Lazić
articles.contents:
Aleksandra Lazic
          
          
          About
          CV
          #HealthComm
          #OpenScience
          #SocialDilemmas
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Lazić
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Back to Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Research on public health communication
            How do online media report about alternative medicine? Read the
            paper, reporting a content analysis study I led as part
            of the Reason4Health project. Or try our
            generator random news stories on scientifically unsupported
            herbal remedies!
            
            
             How should public messaging leverage vaccination
            rates? Is it better to emphasize individual or social
            benefits of vaccination? What do social norms have to do
            with vaccination? Read the
            preprint and the paper,
            reporting experimental and survey studies from my PhD
            project.
            
            
             How do online media report about vaccination rates?
            Read the paper,
            reporting a content analysis study from my PhD project.
            Why should we use stories to counter anti-vaccination
            conspiracy theories? Read our review
            paper.
            
            
             What photos should – and shouldn’t – be used in
            public communication about vaccination? Find
            out in the blogpost I wrote, with links to 150 examples
            of good photos that are open and free to use.
            For a full list of my publications and outreach
            activities, please see my CV.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Lazić
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      Back to Homepage
                    
                  
                                  
              
            
            
              
              Research on public health communication
              How do online media report about alternative medicine?
              Read the
              paper, reporting a content analysis study I led as
              part of the Reason4Health project. Or try our
              generator random news stories on scientifically
              unsupported herbal remedies!
              
              
               How should public messaging leverage vaccination
              rates? Is it better to emphasize individual or social
              benefits of vaccination? What do social norms have to do
              with vaccination? Read the
              preprint and the paper,
              reporting experimental and survey studies from my PhD
              project.
              
              
               How do online media report about vaccination
              rates? Read the
              paper, reporting a content analysis study from my PhD
              project.
              Why should we use stories to counter anti-vaccination
              conspiracy theories? Read our
              review paper.
              
              
               What photos should – and shouldn’t – be used in
              public communication about vaccination? Find
              out in the blogpost I wrote, with links to 150
              examples of good photos that are open and free to use.
              For a full list of my publications and outreach
              activities, please see my CV.

            About me
            I am a PhD Researcher at the University of Belgrade (LIRA Lab).
            My current research explores how social context
            influences our health decisions and its implications for
            policy and public communication (e.g. in the media). Find more
            in #HealthComm.
            I am also interested in how people decide to help others
            and contribute to the public good. Find
            more in #SocialDilemmas.
            I am actively engaged in promoting open research data
            sharing as well as improving the inclusivity and
            accessibility of open science. Find
            more in #OpenScience.
            If you want to get on my good side, ask me about my next
            half-marathon.
            For a full list of my publications and outreach
            activities, please see my CV.
            I created this website with {postcards}
            and {distill}.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Lazić

articles.title: Aleksandra Lazić
articles.contents:
Aleksandra Lazic
          
          
          About
          CV
          #HealthComm
          #OpenScience
          #SocialDilemmas
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Lazić
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Back to Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Open Science
            
            
            I co-founded and have been managing REPOPSI, a repository
            established at the LIRA Lab in 2020. REPOPSI allows everyone
            to freely access and share open psychological scales, tests,
            and other instruments in Serbian. Use REPOPSI for
            your next project!
            In 2022-2023, I led an EOSC Future and Research Data
            Alliance funded REPOPSI improvement project. If words such
            as FAIR, TRUST, and metadata excite you, go here to learn
            about REPOPSI project outputs.
            Even more about REPOPSI, including all of the talks and
            workshops I gave, is here.
            
            
             With the international community ABRIR, I advocate for open
            and equitable big team science. Take a look at the
            conclusions and a database of useful resources compiled
            during a hackathon
            for participants from Serbia and Bosnia-Herzegovina.
            
            
            An academic article you need is behind a paywall? I wrote
            a blogpost
            about some tried and trusted ways to find openly accessible
            versions of articles.
            For a full list of my publications and outreach
            activities, please see my CV.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Lazić
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      Back to Homepage

              I co-founded and have been managing REPOPSI, a
              repository established at the LIRA Lab in 2020. REPOPSI

              REPOPSI for your next project!
              In 2022-2023, I led an EOSC Future and Research Data
              Alliance funded REPOPSI improvement project. If words such
              as FAIR, TRUST, and metadata excite you, go here to learn
              about REPOPSI project outputs.
              Even more about REPOPSI, including all of the talks and
              workshops I gave, is here.
              
              
               With the international community ABRIR, I advocate for
              open and equitable big team science. Take a look at the
              conclusions and a database of useful resources compiled
              during a hackathon
              for participants from Serbia and Bosnia-Herzegovina.
              
              
              An academic article you need is behind a paywall? I
              wrote a blogpost
              about some tried and trusted ways to find openly
              accessible versions of articles.
              For a full list of my publications and outreach
              activities, please see my CV.

              Aleksandra Lazić
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Back to Homepage
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Research on biases in social dilemmas
            Do children and adolescents show bias towards their own
            group when making others better off comes at a cost to
            themselves? I led a meta-analysis study synthesizing
            evidence from 20 experimental economics studies. Read our
            paper.
            
            
            For a full list of my publications and outreach
            activities, please see my CV.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Aleksandra Lazić
